about_the_game:
Game Background
The continent of Adelu has always maintained peace and tranquility, and the forces of evil have been sealed for a long time. However, as the evil power awakens again, as a brave warrior, you are summoned again to engage in a desperate battle against the dark forces.

Game Features
This game is a third person RPG cartoon style game with female protagonists.There are a variety of skill designs: Assassination, Backstabbing, Bounce, Counter Attack, Pursuit, Combos, and Active Skills. By unlocking new skills and using a variety of active and passive skills, you will become even more powerful


The game has rich scenes: mountains, forests, castles, dungeons, caves, snow, etc. The game belongs to the cartoon type and is created using a Unreal Engine 5, featuring “Zelda“ style scenes!


There are many kinds of enemies in the game: melee types, long-range attack types, magic types and giant creatures, different monsters have different attack characteristics, and mastering the enemy's attack characteristics is the key to your successful defeat of the enemy.

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent violence or blood, and the costume design of the characters in the game will have more exposed parts.

Game Background

name: Traveler Of Light

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 或 AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600 或 AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: This game is a third person RPG cartoon game with Zelda style scene design. In the process of fighting against dark forces, you will constantly become stronger, unlock new abilities, and flexibly use multiple skills to defeat enemies in bloody battles.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Korean, Italian
*languages with full audio support
